careers.title: Genetics Lab Assistant
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You also need a bit more on Biological Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.title: Forensic Scientist
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like evaluating. You also need a bit more on Chemical Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You also need a bit more on Physical Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.
